nodes.text: Sronk was a planet in the Oplovis sector of the Outer Rim and the Sronk species homeworld.

During the Thrawn campaign, Sronk's defenses were beaten by seven Imperial Dreadnaught-class heavy cruisers. When Grand Admiral Thrawn appeared to return in 19 ABY, the Sronk senator, who had personally witnessed his homeworld's defeat, advised caution to the New Republic Senate.
